mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_staff_user (user_name, pass_word, salt, real_name, gender, mobile, role_id, role_name, dept_id, dept_name, created_by, created_time, modified_time, modified_by, created_by) VALUES (#{userName}, #{passWord}, #{salt}, #{realName}, #{gender}, #{mobile}, #{roleId}, #{roleName}, #{deptId}, #{deptName}, #{createdBy}, now(), now(), #{modifiedBy}, #{createdBy})
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_staff_user SET role_id = #{roleId}, role_name = #{roleName}, modified_by = #{modifiedBy}, modified_time = now() WHERE id = #{id}
